website_summaries.verdict: With its flashy colors, the Reebok Flashfilm Trainer helps to bring some style into one’s daily workouts. Extensively praised as a comfortable workout shoe, it offers high value for a reasonable price.
pros: The majority of users regard the Flashfilm Trainer as a very comfortable shoe for training, running, and everyday wear
Many wearers are happy with the support they receive from this Reebok pair
The shoe’s platform provides good ground contact for weightlifting exercises, as stated by multiple testers
The overall style and color combinations have won the hearts of most customers
More than a few people take note of the excellent quality-price ratio
cons: Several buyers find it difficult to put on the shoe because of the upper construction
The visible glue on the sides of the trainer makes a few purchasers question its durability
The lack of ankle support in the upper has disappointed a few users

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend as a Christmas present. He needed new running shoes. He loves them! His foot is actually wide so i was worried at first but he says they fit great! And are super comfortable & they look great on! Considering buying a pair for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Expected better.
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. Comfortable enough. Much bigger than any other size 10 sneakers I have. Can’t really tighten them up or they get a funky shape. Can’t run faster than light jog in them or they fall off. Definitely can’t do sprints. Honestly disappointed in everything but the look. Inside right heal ripped within first week. Would have returned them if I bought them at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lang

customer_reviews.title: amazing shoe , wish if it was a little wider after arch area ...
customer_reviews.text: amazing shoe durable, comfy and stylish.perfect for training and even for walking. This shoe is true to size, BUT if you have a wide foot don't buy this shoe, especially those who have a too wide foot because it's tight in the middle area before the toe. BUT if you want I recommend you to go 1/2 size up. I will put an illustration in one of the pictures to refer to the area that causes the tightness
customer_reviews.author: ABDULKHALEQ AYDIN

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these and says they are super comfortable. He is usually a size 9.5 but we had ordered these from Reebok in that size and they were too big. I went to exchange but they were sold out and Amazon had them in a 9! These fit him great and he says they make him step correctly, where he usually rotates his ankles down, inward slightly when he steps. Really nice design and go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes fu Nike!
customer_reviews.text: Reebok makes consistent sizing and awesome shoes. "New" shoes have been engineered to reduce costs. These have a heel cup that is too flexible. It takes getting used to or you have to wear grandfather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: A Good Pair of Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes, I bought two pairs of them, one for work and the other for the gym. They are comfy enough for 8 hours of work and they hold up pretty good in the gym as well. They come out of the box with a lot of grip on the bottom which I really liked, especially for my gym pair. They do have some cheap laces in my opinion, I might switch them out for something a little more high quality. They fit snug which I actually like but some people may not like a snug shoe, so take that for what it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: KSleep

customer_reviews.title: Replace please
customer_reviews.text: Hi Amazon! All different products I have bought with you have been perfect! Only thing is that I finally had the chance to use those REEBOK shoes, but they don’t fit as expected, they’re a little bigger. The best that would fit is a Size 10.5 not a Size 11. Please help return them or replace them for a 10.5 you can contact me at fgutierrez@southerncarlson.com Thanks Amazon im still very happy with all your services
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!!... But...
customer_reviews.text: It lookes so great on my feet!! I wanted to love them so much!! They were kind of tight, but I'm used to breaking in most shoes because I have wide feet. The major flaw in the shoe design was the heel. My heel kept coming up/out as I walked. That was the only reason I returned them...
customer_reviews.author: Xiong T.

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a half size up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and comfort of shoes. Had to regift my size 7 and get a size 7.5 though bc the 7 fit in the length and sole width but caused my upper arch/ankle to be sore bc the opening was too narrow
customer_reviews.author: MsEdgeRN

customer_reviews.title: Fat guy approved
customer_reviews.text: Really light shoe with great comfort and cushion. I have a habit of wearing the same shoe daily, so I tend to wear them out quick. And one of the items I look for in a shoe is the cushion. And on the Reebok Flashfilm train cross shoe, that comfort is exactly what I needed. One slight quibble, the back ankle support is a little short / lacking, but that's just a nitpick item! Overall, really impressed with Flashfilm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of some negative reviews about them being too slim. I have wide feet and I love them! They look great, they feel great, and they are mint!
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for everyday use and he loves them. According to him, it is like walking on clouds, super comfortable and a perfect fit. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nima Rey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great for working out and everyday life. I originally bought for gym-life but they were so comfortable that I bought a second pair for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Latham

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed on how comfortable these sneakers are. I'm definitely will be buying myself another pair soon in different color.
customer_reviews.author: ExtendedRoar

customer_reviews.title: Check properly before buying.
customer_reviews.text: This trainers look good but to wear is very difficult because I have a wide feet, it need to stretch widely before feet could seat in. This trainer have laces but it’s not functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great and I'm assuming they are comfortable, if you have thin feet, which my son and I do not have. And they are hard to slip into
customer_reviews.author: laura Chavira

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, comfy, but too big and loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: I got a size smaller than normal to be safe, but these were still too big and easy to roll your ankle in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Loos

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, super comfortable for walk around. They do feel minimal on the ankle support, but still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carta4life

customer_reviews.title: Well rounded cross trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very well rounded shoe for cross training. Good for jumping, running, ladder drills etc. Nice semi sturdy platform even for deadlifts if you don't want to take the time to switch over your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: doku

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They fit and feel great on my feet. I work 12 hours a night. So these are great
customer_reviews.author: Jason almonte

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Way to narrow. Nice product though. I couldn't even get a foot in with the sox fit entry.very nice looking.Returning them
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: not good for court surfaces/cutting
customer_reviews.text: comfy. looks good. not great on court surfaces for cutting. material is stoo slick on inside of shoe and my foot keeps popping out when trying to cut hard and I can't lace up shoe tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and TTS.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! They fit true to size and are very comfy. He wore them all around Disney for 5 days and kept commenting on how comfortable they were!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size (10.5)
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wide feet and these fit perfectly. Comfortable and nice looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: JAN O

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size up recommended
customer_reviews.text: They fit well. Even if you have a wide foot. I went a 1/2 size up and it's perfect for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Used shoe sold as "new"
customer_reviews.text: They fit great but unfortunately the left shoe was clearly used with dirt on the bottom and a small scuff on the sole. Otherwise the shoes were in great shape so I didn't return. When you buy a "new" product the expectation is that the product is new.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes...
customer_reviews.text: I like the color so much, very lightweight... amazing shoes like in the picture... Just ask for half size down... I'm really happy
customer_reviews.author: Erick v.

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and look just like the picture. Wear to the gym everyday for 2-3 weeks now and now signs of wear
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoe, around the ankle is very flexible not a normal shoe for working out running or sports wouldn’t be much ankle support but definitely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Order your normal size
customer_reviews.text: A bit to large. Reviews said to order a size larger so I did. Do not listen to those individuals. Order your proper size.
customer_reviews.author: jacob noble

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. Usually buy shoes a size big, but had to get a smaller size in these shoes since they don’t lace up.
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Wish they made in a size 15
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One for wife which she love but the one for me was small and they don’t carry a size 15. But shoe looks good and feels good wife says
customer_reviews.author: rashaad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!! I was skeptical when making this purchase because I was afraid of poor quality but the item was as pictured and great quality. The fit was perfect! My boyfriend loved the shoes and they look great. They arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Al T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit me perfect. I have narrow feet and most shoes no matter the brand usually have too much room in them. These Reebok’s are the perfect fit for my narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Good for lifting. Not ideal for cardio. Enjoying them very much
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Caused me foot pain
customer_reviews.text: The shoe design caused me a lot of pain after wearing them all day. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Belton

customer_reviews.title: No ankle support
customer_reviews.text: Soles are supportive. Uppers are way too flimsy. Zero ankle support. Not good for much other than walking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert MSSTATE

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work. The soles are holding up better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Squishy. There are better shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are flimsy and they do not stay on well. The heel portion slips off and the sole is really squishy. Overall they just aren’t that good of exercise shoes. There are better brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: JudeH

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the gym and broke it in the first day. I have wide feet but it fits well and breaks in rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: Raygar

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoes looked like it had been worn. It came untied with creases and was on top of the wrapping paper with no paper inside of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: josh kuhnemund

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit and felt great but it started falling apart after one week. The stitching came undone on one and the heal of the other started coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Kylw

customer_reviews.title: Kick butt shoe
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite shoe I've ever owned. Super comfortable and look amazing. Great for the gym or lounging.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: my crossfit Reebock
customer_reviews.text: I have to change it, because the size had nothing to do with me. In terms of quality, the product seemed to be average.
customer_reviews.author: Maximiliano Rubilar

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would but again
customer_reviews.text: I really love these! I wasn’t expecting them to be as comfortable as they are
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort. I use them at work when I’m on my feet for 10 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Feet doesn't even go inside because of the faulty design
customer_reviews.text: Feet doesn't even go inside because of the faulty design
customer_reviews.author: varad chavan

customer_reviews.title: Loading...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and how comfortable they are, I don’t like the facts that I only got 2 pairs, I need more lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had the original shoe box.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were good. Just upset that my shoes didn't come with the original shoe box.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome Bottom line so comfy love that Reebok is coming back
customer_reviews.author: Anthony genardi

customer_reviews.title: multi purpose use...  worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. It fits snug, but comfortable. I use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: dwayne dyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: In a matter of one week they hace started to detach
customer_reviews.author: Evangelia Protehiros

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Flashfilm Train Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: Reebok Men's Flashfilm Trainer Running Shoes flash a bit of style as you race by. These men's training shoes are made for intense stop-and-start workouts. The textile upper stretches and provides support where it's needed most. A polyurethane midsole gives you a responsive and comfortable feel.
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: These sneakers are engineered with a Flexweave woven textile upper which provides resilient stretch, seamless targeted support, and breathable protection

EFFICIENT FOOT SUPPORT: These stylish trainers with lightweight FLASHFILM polyurethane midsole are ultra-responsive on every stride; Die-cut EVA sockliner offers durable and ultimate performance comfort which lasts many strolls and jogs
COMFORTABLE AND STURDY DESIGN: This footwear with full-length rubber outsole provides superior durability, traction and a firm grip on uneven surfaces
HIGH-PERFORMANCE RUNNING SHOES: Ideal for walking, urban running, and high-intensity training
